Job Title: Commercial Bond Policy Issuer

Location: Philadelphia, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Customer Service

Description:
We are seeking to add a Policy Issuer to our Commercial Bond Department! You will be responsible for accurate policy issuing, file maintenance, and record keeping.
Responsibilities:Enter variety of data using current technologyCreate and maintain logs for tracking purposesReview discrepancies in data received and advise supervisor of issuesIssue new bonds that come through Surety Cloud - Verify that the info given by agents is accurate and meets the requirements for the bond form - Verify that payment has been collected - Reach out to the agent if necessary to collect additional informationUtilize Surety platforms to aid in the issuance process (One Beacon, Hudson, Crum)Electronically file NMLS Bonds and BMC’sUtilize Excel spreadsheets to keep record of the shipment, bond number, renewal, and changes for each bond.Purchase Renewals through Hudson’s eSurety platformIssue renewal documents such as continuation certificates, and verification certificatesIssue any changes being made by a principal for their bond such as address, name, or term datesMaintain correspondence with individuals at each Surety when submitting changes or renewals for previously issued bondsMaintain open communication with team members
Qualifications:Previous experience in policy issuing, data entry or other related fieldsExcellent communication and typing skillsStrong organizational skillsDeadline and detail-orientedShow eagerness and capacity to learn
Risk Strategies is the 9th largest privately held US brokerage firm offering comprehensive risk management advice, insurance and reinsurance placement for property & casualty, employee benefits, private client services, as well as consulting services and financial & wealth solutions. With more than 30 specialty practices, Risk Strategies serves commercial companies, nonprofits, public entities, and individuals, and has access to all major insurance markets. Risk Strategies has over 100 offices and over 5,000 employees across the US and Canada.
Our industry recognition includes being named a Best Places to Work in Insurance for the past five years (2018-2022) and on the Inc. 5000 list as one of America’s Fastest Growing Private Companies. We are committed to being good stewards for our company, culture, and communities by having a strong focus on Environmental, Social, and Governance issues.
Candidate must reside in Pennsylvania

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
